name: Advance Aviation Training (Fiji) Pte Ltd
about: Advance Aviation Training (Fiji) Pte Ltd, established in 2002, is a leading provider of professional pilot training in Fiji. Based at Nadi International Airport, the school operates a fleet of single and twin-engine aircraft, including Cessna 150s, 172s, and a Partenavia PB68. It also features a state-of-the-art DCX Pro-Motion Flight Simulator for instrument training. The school offers courses in Private Pilot Licences, Commercial Pilot Licences, Airline Transport Pilot Licence theory, twin endorsements, instrument ratings, and instructor ratings. With fully air-conditioned classrooms and personalized tuition, Advance Aviation Training has trained students from across the Pacific region and beyond. The school is committed to ensuring students achieve their goal of becoming professional pilots.
services: ["Private Pilot Licence (PPL)\nCommercial Pilot Licence (CPL)\nFiji Airline Transport Pilot Licence (ATPL) Theory"]
